entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
